name: Nest Guard VR
description:
Done in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam

Nest guard is a PCVR Game, you need a desktop headset to play

Sinopsys

You cannot imagine what a mother dino is ready to do in order to protect her offspring.

Protect your nest from the predators until your eggs have hatched.

The predator will take a egg from your nest and flee to eat it elsewhere.

Hit a dinosaur with your claws to kill it.

Controls

* Left analog to move around

* Right analog to snap turn

* Grip to grip objets (no use for now)

* Trigger to click on button pointed with laser

Team

* @Louspirit : developer & texturing

* @Popo3744 : designer

* @Clemzd : music maker
